remarks: The negative of a measurable function is measurable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.)
statement:
mbfneg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
mbfneg.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfneg $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> -u B ) e. MblFn ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
